==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=俾-colloquial Cantonese}}

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-bəj-n/k||to give}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|སྦྱིན||to give, to bestow}} and {{cog|my|ပေး||to give}}.

===Pronunciation===

|cat=v,prep

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|literary|or|Cantonese}} to [[give]]
#: {{zh-x|王 崩，周 人 將 畀 虢{Guó} 公{Gōng} 政。|The king (of Zhou) died. Zhou people will '''give''' Duke of Guo power.}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[for]]
#: {{zh-x|原先 係 畀 你 食 嘅。|It was originally '''for''' you to eat.|C}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to [[allow]] (someone or something to do something)
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to allow (an event to happen)
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[to]]
#: {{zh-x|講 畀 你 知|to tell you|C}}
